scripts.build:words:umap:ko: node build-umap-words.mjs --words data/korean_words.txt --embeddings data/cc.ko.300.vec --out client/public/stars.json --selectedVectorsOut data/selected_korean_vectors.cc.ko.300.vec --missingOut data/selected_korean_vectors.cc.ko.300.missing.txt --seed 42 --metric cosine --l2Normalize true --minDist 0.02 --nNeighbors 8 --spread 1.0 --scale 250
